pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, July 30, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

The Prime Minister will attend a private event.

Closed to media

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will lay flowers at the fountain at the Alexander the Great Parkette.

Danforth Avenue and Logan Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.
